result.title: A small python script for downloading your solutions
result.content:
There are some nice solutions from other guys (http://codeforces.ru/blog/entry/9071) but they actually are not very handy. However, codeforces api provides us with a useful set of methods that makes tasks like this much easier.

So, you can download the script here and have fun with it.

Happy New Year, guys!

UPD: There were some IndentationErrors (github for some reason changes indentation). Thanks to Determinism who pointed to that. Now it should be fine.
